summary: A young couple's dream home turns into a house of horrors when the disturbing, violent acts of three generations of doomed families is reawakened for them to witness.
cast: Felissa Rose|Jonathan Tiersten|John Philbin|Dustin Stevens|Monique Parent|Andrea Vahl|William A. Robertson|Kris Smith|Timothy Dugan|Alex Victoria|Michael Wagner|Holly Greene|Hans Hernke|Becky Friedman|Angelina Leigh|Jamie Lee Baker|Tyler Nemeth|Evan Vallaincourt|Alan Kroll|Chris Raab
title: The Perfect House
